languages.text: "Не задавать подобных вопросов. Мне не нужны подхалимы. Я сделаю необходимые выводы о твоей кандидатуре, когда тебе представится возможность проявить себя. Когда эта возможность появится — ведомо только Богу-Императору".

traits.locale_text: "Не задавать подобных вопросов. Мне не нужны подхалимы. Я сделаю необходимые выводы о твоей кандидатуре, когда тебе представится возможность проявить себя. Когда это возможность появится — ведомо только Богу-Императору".

languages.text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."
languages.original_text: "Не задавать подобных вопросов. Мне не нужны подхалимы. Я сделаю необходимые выводы о твоей кандидатуре, когда тебе представится возможность проявить себя. Когда эта возможность появится — ведомо только Богу-Императору".

traits.locale_text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity comes your way to prove yourself. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

"You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity comes your way to prove yourself. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

"You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

"You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

"You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

languages.text: “你可以从别再问这种问题做起，我不需要马屁精。等你有机会证明自己的时候，我会看到你的所作所为。至于你什么时候才能得到这样的机会，恐怕只有神皇才知道了。”
languages.original_text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

traits.locale_text: “你可以从别再问这种问题做起，我不需要马屁精。等你有机会证明自己的时候，我会看到你的所作所为。至于你什么时候才能得到这样的机会，恐怕只有神皇才知道了。”

languages.text: «De entrada, no preguntes cosas así. No necesito adulador{mf|e|a}s. Sacaré mis propias conclusiones cuando llegue el momento de demostrar tu valía. En cuanto a cuándo llegará ese momento, solo el Dios Emperador lo sabe».
languages.original_text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

traits.locale_text: «De entrada, no preguntes cosas así. No necesito adulador{mf|e|a}s. Sacaré mis propias conclusiones cuando llegue el momento de demostrar tu valía. En cuanto a cuándo llegará ese momento, solo el Dios Emperador lo sabe».

languages.text: 「では、このような質問をやめろ。私におべっかは必要ない。私が結論を出すのは、あなたが実力を示す機会が訪れたときだ。その機会がいつ与えられるかについては、神帝陛下のみぞ知る」
languages.original_text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

traits.locale_text: 「こういった種類の質問をしないことから始めなさい。私にはおべっかは必要ありません。あなた自身を証明する機会が訪れたときに私は結論を出します。その機会がいつ与えられるかについては、神帝陛下のみがご存じです」
「では、このような質問をやめろ。私におべっかは必要ない。私が結論を出すのは、あなたが実力を示す機会が訪れたときだ。その機会がいつ与えられるかについては、神帝陛下のみぞ知る」

languages.text: « Vous pourriez commencer par ne pas poser ce genre de questions. Je n'ai que faire des flagorneurs. Je tirerai mes conclusions lorsque l'occasion de faire vos preuves se présentera, et seul l'Empereur-Dieu seul sait quand cela se produira. »
languages.original_text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez commencer par ne pas poser ce genre de questions. Je n'ai que faire des flagorneurs. Je tirerai mes conclusions lorsque l'occasion de faire vos preuves se présentera, et seul l'Empereur-Dieu seul sait quand cela se produira. »

languages.text: "Beginnt damit, mir keine solchen Fragen zu stellen. Ich habe keinen Respekt vor Speichelleckern. Ich werde meine Schlüsse ziehen, wenn sich eine Gelegenheit ergibt, Euch zu beweisen. Wann Ihr diese Gelegenheit erhalten werdet, weiß nur der Gottimperator."
languages.original_text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

traits.locale_text: "Beginnt damit, mir keine solchen Fragen zu stellen. Ich habe keinen Respekt vor Speichelleckern. Ich werde meine Schlüsse ziehen, wenn sich eine Gelegenheit ergibt, Euch zu beweisen. Wann Ihr diese Gelegenheit erhalten werdet, weiß nur der Gottimperator."

languages.text: "İşe bu tarz sorular sormayarak başlayabilirsin. Dalkavukluktan hazzetmem. Kendini kanıtlayacağın fırsat ortaya çıktığında notumu vereceğim. O fırsatın ne zaman doğacağını ise bir tek Tanrı İmparator bilir."
languages.original_text: "You can start by not asking questions of this sort. I have no need for sycophants. I will draw my conclusions when an opportunity to prove yourself arises. As for when you will be granted that opportunity, only the God-Emperor knows."

traits.locale_text: "İşe bu tarz sorular sormayarak başlayabilirsin. Dalkavukluktan hazzetmem. Kendini kanıtlayacağın fırsat ortaya çıktığında notumu vereceğim. O fırsatın ne zaman doğacağını ise bir tek Tanrı İmparator bilir."
